title: Self-Transformation and Identity Exploration: Interdisciplinary Projects for Liberal Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and self-reflection capabilities
context.additional_context: Learners are general citizens aged 40+, with elementary-level language proficiency. Capable of self-expression and collaborative projects using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three components of their identity through a 4-week project
Learners can create a portfolio that concretizes their life plan using an interdisciplinary approach (language + culture + technology)
Learners can propose at least two practical strategies to enhance multicultural communication skills by exchanging feedback with peers
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
